doc:
Hugh Simon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugh_Simon 0 Hugh Simon is a British actor, best known for his portrayal of the character Malcolm Wynn-Jones in the television series Spooks. His other TV credits include Shackleton, Attachments, Cold Feet, North Square, Big Bad World, and "Unusual Suspects" (an episode of Highlander: The Series). He has also appeared onstage, as in the 2005 London revival of Epitaph for George Dillon, and in the film Possession. Hugh_Simon is a_British_actor , best_known for his_portrayal of the_character_Malcolm_Wynn-Jones in the_television_series_Spooks . His_other_TV_credits include Shackleton_,_Attachments_,_Cold_Feet , North_Square , Big_Bad_World , and " Unusual_Suspects " ( an_episode of Highlander : The_Series_) . He has_also_appeared onstage , as in the_2005_London_revival of Epitaph for George_Dillon , and in the_film_Possession .
